roleset.name: work out terms of agreement

example.name: NP/PP
example.text: Both companies are in the process of negotiating contracts with LTV and others .

example.name: double PP
example.text: It recently signed a preliminary agreement to negotiate exclusively with the Bank of Tokyo Ltd. for the sale of part of its leasing business to the Japanese bank .

propbank.arg: with the Bank of Tokyo Ltd.
for the sale of part of its leasing business to the Japanese bank

example.name: unstated agreement
example.text: Although Georgia Gulf has n't been eager to negotiate with Mr. Simmons and NL , a specialty chemicals concern ...

propbank.arg: with Mr. Simmons and NL , a specialty chemicals concern

example.name: unstated co-negotiator
example.text: Santa Fe has disclosed that it is negotiating to sell a 20 % interest in its real estate unit to the California Public Employees Retirement System for roughly $ 400 million .

propbank.arg: to sell a 20 % interest in its real estate unit to the California Public Employees Retirement System for roughly $ 400 million

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Warner itself was in negotiations with MGM over certain movie and other rights

propbank.arg: over certain movie and other rights

example.name: joint actors = arg0
example.text: the negotiation between China and Korea on the co - operation in the four major domains : automotive , civil aviation , high definition TV and program - controlled switchboards ...

propbank.arg: in the four major domains : automotive , civil aviation , high definition TV and program - controlled switchboards

roleset.note: NEGOTIATE-V NOTES: Treebank sometimes puts the co-negotiator in with the agreement, whichis certainly plausible (ie, "negotiating a pact with GM" is it a pactwith GM or a negotiation with GM? (Both, really.) Follow Treebank'sparsing. (from negotiate.01-v)
NEGOTIATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Corresponds to VNcls negotiate-36.1. (from negotiation.01-n)
